website_summaries.verdict: A fairly reliable heat press, though lack of a user manual will have inexperienced owners scrambling to find instructions online.
pros: Temperature is accurate to within 5 degrees, users find
Big enough to handle adult size t-shirts
cons: Instructions generally aren’t included with this press
Opening the clamshell can take a lot of effort
Reports of unit failing after just a few uses

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SHIRTS!
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn't advertised as being good for pressing t-shirt transfers I would give it a better review. This might be good for small design applications but it isn't good for large designs on shirts for 2 reasons: 1. As shown in photos, the heat isn't consistent throughout the heat plate. 2. The temperature indicator is always 25-100 degrees higher than the actual temperature on the plate depending on where you measure the heat. In the photos I set the heat press to 400F and got heat measurements from 275-380F.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas88

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE! BE CAREFUL CAN START A FIRE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a worst heat press ever and the customer service is horrendous. They take forever to get back to you and then send you a "picture" of a return label that is blurry and can't print out so I have no way of returning this faulty machine. This heat press was fine for the first few months and then the temperature starting rising on it's own like it was possessed. We smelled burning and some of the cords starting melting. I contacted the seller and he said he was pretty sure he knew what it was (really?) and he wanted to send me a part so I would replace it MYSELF. No way.....this is an unsafe machine. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this heat press. After reading some of the previous reviews, set up was easy. I didn't realize I had to have it open in order to change menu choices, but once set, it was super easy. I have made multiple shirts already. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: DO Not buy this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have been working with F2C customer service since the beginning. They sent me a replacement after asking for multiple videos and pictures wasting a lot of time and materials. I purchased a heat test kit to prove my point. They kept asking me to wait patiently. I did for a while then said no. They sent me a new machine - it did not work either. Now they want to send me parts to repair. This has never worked! They will not refund because it has been to long while I "patiently waited." I have wasted my time and money. I have not made one successful t-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Plates would not heat over 250 farenheit and heated unevenly. I spent over $100 in shipping to return the item and was not refunded my full amount paid for the return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Temperature not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for pressing vinyl. I always wondered why, on the appropriate heat setting, my vinyl would not stick. I finally got a heat gun and used it. The temperature was 100 degrees off. The tightening knob is also getting harder to use with time. This much money for a product that’s temperature isn’t accurate is ridiculous. That can and has ruined multiple projects: t-shirts, at least a hundred dollars in vinyl, etc. I planned on earning my money back from this purchase, but instead I haven’t been able to even start a business selling any products because they would never adhere correctly. I have tried so many things and finally decided it had to be the heat press.
customer_reviews.author: Doll

customer_reviews.title: excellent heat press for the home crafter
customer_reviews.text: I really have enjoyed my heat press. I use it to make fabulous creations for my children. My only complaint is the paint was scratched in several places upon unboxing where the metal shows through. However, it does not affect the integrity of the unit. It is very nice to have a easy to use. I received a instruction booklet as well with my unit.
customer_reviews.author: BLESSED

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad unit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The heat press did not heat up when it arrived, I sent video to the company to let them know, they advised that I check the fuse on the press. Once I had opened up the back plate I realized there was a wire hanging from the terminal that wasn't connected. I replaced the crimp connector and reconnected it and the press started heating up. I agree with other reviews that the temp gauge isn't accurate. Also if they could drill bolt holes in the base to allow easy mounting of the unit that would help as sometimes I lift the handle and the entire machine comes up off the table rather than opening.
customer_reviews.author: Giraffix inc.

customer_reviews.title: I like the press
customer_reviews.text: So, I like the press, works well for me and my small business. I love that the teflon sheet in on the top, so no extra one is needed and that the rubber mat is easily taken off and on. It's nice to work to the side and then move it all to press. Couple of things to think about of purchasing: 1-the rubber mat that comes with smells bad when heated. After 5 uses, it has not improved. 2-it's takes a good tug/muscle/ jerk to pull the handle up when it locks. It locks everytime you put the press down all the way. 3-no manual
customer_reviews.author: Casey Hann

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work properly. I have a heat press that I've been using for many years, bought this as an upgrade for that machine to do a large order for a local sports team that my daughter plays for as a gift to the girls. To my surprise, I had to go over each piece more than a dozen times to get the vinyl to stay. Switched back to my old machine, same heat and time settings and once did the trick. This machine is nothing more than a giant paperweight now. Need to contact Amazon for a full refund, it is useless. Makes work take ten times longer than my old machine so it's pointless to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: It does not have consent heat across the heating plate ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not have consent heat across the heating plate. You can not do a large image. You can't get the middle hot enough without over heating and ruining the edge of the image.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Heat is not consistent at all. DO NOT BUY TO MAKE COTTON SHIRTS, THEY WILL PEEL. ...This company recently has contacted me and has offered me $25 to change my review of this press. I guess that's all the press is worth to them. F2C has also offered to send me replacement parts but that is just one email after another of endless questions and trying to get me to change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Fiello

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality heat press
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality heat press. It adheres HTV to shirts in about 20 seconds. The machine is very heavy and takes a strong man to open and close it. The rubber pad makes positioning very easy and allows for the tension to be set just right. The machine is not coated with Teflon, so a pad needs to be used. The machine will heat up to 300 degrees in about 6 minutes and will remain hot as long as the machine is on. I would recommend this product to anybody looking to make HTV transfers.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Good...but
customer_reviews.text: Not bad get hot but a few issues. 1. Is there a way to receive an instruction manual. If digital please send link to newsomejaesaun@gmail.com 2. Constantly keeps clicking when OUT led is shown how come. 3. Was playing around a bit and managed to find out how to change from C - F. But what are all the other settings following it. 4. How come it does not lock automatically. It did once when I first tried it but never again. Why? Please email if you have solutions. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JaeSaun N.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t heat properly
customer_reviews.text: I brought this heat press last year for a gift in June for my husbands business and it does not I repeat does not heat properly across the press . It is very stessful when you have an order to feel and can’t because transfers won’t stick DO NOT BUY. It is cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.author: Kabrey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought last Christmas for a gift. Arrived after Christmas . Used a couple of times and quit heating up.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Salt

customer_reviews.title: 3 yr follow up review
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over three years now, used at least 30 hours per week and it still works exactly as it did the first time i used it!!
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: I love this heat press
customer_reviews.text: I love this heat press. I just wish it came with an instruction booklet or something. I had to search the Internet for heat settings and timing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: sekzreds

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! There are too many bad reviews and I should have read them ALL! Didn’t come with instructions, heat is not consistant on the plates, temperature setting is wrong had to up temp by 60 degrees, had to bolt to talble to open press so it wouldn’t burn shirts. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had a swing arm before and disliked it, decided on this clamshell and so far I'm in love. I haven't used it much yet but I've attached some orders I've done with it as and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Uncontrollable temperature
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this press, immediately overheated. Couldn’t turn temperature down, temp just kept increasing.
customer_reviews.author: Konda Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Okay, i follow the heat time and temp... also have tried several different ones, also i am using a teflon sheet. i make sure im doing the right peel. Ive used different vinyl and The vinyl is not wanting to stick when i pull the plastic piece off. I have checked the pressure. Sort of the bottom part will peel fine but stuff closer to the top will not. Ive seen some people say that theres is not heating the same through out. Is thats what is happening? How do I send it back, is there a warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Amazo

customer_reviews.title: Works great once I figured out the the temperature was almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great once I figured out the the temperature was almost 60° difference from the digital readout than actual, everything seemed to work fine. I had to set the press to 435°F to get a laser reading of 375°F.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Wonder why I didn’t buy sooner. I bought this to replace my swing away heat press. This one is simple to use. There’s no pieces to assemble. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: TrishAnn Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. Cold spots everywhere. If your actually trying to use this press, you will be very disappointed. It's nothing but a junk paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use once you
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use once you watch a video of how to use it since this doesn't come with any directions or manual.
customer_reviews.author: Gravlee's

customer_reviews.title: Good but..
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for little over a year. Like previous posters, it heats very unevenly (30+ degrees off on the sides). I have to press in multiple directions and move the shirt as close to the middle as possible, very time consuming. It’s good for little projects or someone who won’t be using it a lot at one time, but I do T-shirt’s frequently and it’s kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Saltis

customer_reviews.title: I like this heat pressure because of the transfer sheet on ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this heat pressure because of the transfer sheet on top. It is awesome. The only thing about it I have issues bringing up the clamp once the beeping goes off, I have to use non heated material to lift it up. Maybe its the way i have the pressure set up.But I have tried almost everything. Oh, and I will suggest to look into the video a lady has posted, since it does not come with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, just plug in, adjust your temperature and time in seconds and you are ready to print!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Temp Consistency
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is easy to use and temp is consistent.
customer_reviews.author: barnetta

customer_reviews.title: Bought this and tried for a while with getting pressure ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and tried for a while with getting pressure settings and such adjusted, but no matter what, it would not heat the entire area and a large portion would always come out faded and does not transfer. Want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I ordered in 2018 and 2020 it stopped working right it will not heat up correctly I've had to get a different press
customer_reviews.author: tosha bohannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FOR PROFESSIONAL OR AT HOME APPLICATION - EASY SET UP WELL BUILT!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Y.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This machine delivers! Huge value for the price. Easy to use. Just the right size and heavy. I use it for curing screen prints and for adhering vinyl to shirts and anything else I can think of. Very pleased! Perfect for the crafter.
customer_reviews.author: Ian McGlynn

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere power button melted - dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Broke after only minimal use - power button MELTED it could have started a fire - don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy's Law 75

customer_reviews.title: Work's great but it is tough to open
customer_reviews.text: This press work's great, I like the auto start time. It heats up relatively quick for a heat press and stay's to temp. It defiantly has a great squeeze when pressing. The only draw back is when you need to open it, it is tough, I had to really mussel it open.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this press for several months and it works as expected. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: SmithAmazon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They are very responsive and very considerate if there is a problem with the machine, they are definatly there to help out in anyway. Thank y'all so much.. Great Product Great comminication. Great service. I will def. Recommend anyone to buy with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Collins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!! Super fast shipping, easy set up and works great!!! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She is very crafty and has made many things but has used this to make T shirts fun T shirts for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter inlaw. She loves it! She is very crafty and has made many things but has used this to make T shirts fun T shirts for the whole family. Birthdays, Mothers Day,Weddings and baby showers..
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed my heat press machine and it’s a great investment.

customer_reviews.title: Product overheats crackles like it’s about to catch fire
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking this product would last more than 1-1/2 year. Once turned on very often it over heats and makes noises like it’s about to catch fire. The smell is so bad smells like burnt metal and rubber Is this common?
customer_reviews.author: danielle culberson

customer_reviews.title: AVOID AT ALL COST!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible heat press! Better off using an iron... very hard to work!

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This heat press is horrible!!! I have many complaints about Vinyl not sticking to shirtsZ

customer_reviews.text: Product never worked for the day we open the box, then company wanted us to open the back and and re wire the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues and we’ve had just about a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not a Quality Press.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the press for three months and already the timer has stopped working. I've used it less than 10 times. Otherwise, when properly functioning, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great press. I am very impressed with the quality. Shipping was fast and packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nina J

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, it worked for 3 months and then ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, it worked for 3 months and then no longer heats up properly. Wont even transfer a basic vinyl to a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Kostrzewa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works great and haven’t had any issues with it!
customer_reviews.author: jillybean

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a few months. I did the initial burn off. I tried one shirt. Then, I never touched it. Finally, I used it on several shirts, a head band, and on shoes. I love it. This was a good purchase for me. I would have liked was the instructions included with the heat press. I contacted the seller, and it was emailed to me. The temperature setting was in Celcius. Easy to change from watching video.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Raspberry

customer_reviews.title: Read
customer_reviews.text: Screws for handle are stripped. Good thing I'm a jack of all trades so I could keep it operational. Cheaply made but it's doing job so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. No directions and settings are in Celsius. After watching video I reset it to Fahrenheit.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Best price for your money
customer_reviews.text: Loved it works very well nothing bad to say Easy to use the price was the best part will buy one more
customer_reviews.author: Jose B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. I have an ETSY shop and make purses and bags. Every thing I make requires iron on interfacing and this machine has made doing this super fast ans super easy!

customer_reviews.title: horrible. it does not heat up
customer_reviews.text: horrible. it does not heat up. it is a waste of money, time, and space.

customer_reviews.title: Its a great machine
customer_reviews.text: Its great!! The only issue is the mat isn't glued down to the machine but other than that its a great machine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.....
customer_reviews.text: It came with no instructions or receipt. It does not work on times N temps it calls for. So still not able to use it. Definitely not happy with product...

customer_reviews.title: ... little hard to open but other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.text: The heat press is a little hard to open but other than that it's great!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all with this machine! Makes crafting so much easier!

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had read the other reviews before purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the other reviews before purchasing so I would have known there was no instruction manual. I would have purchased a different model. Hopefully I'll find instructions or a video online. No equipment of this caliber should ever be sold without at a minimum, basic instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my daughter as a gift. She loves it .!!!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I have to iron on. No matter how high the temp is.

customer_reviews.title: Love this press
customer_reviews.text: Love this press had it since jan and it runs like a champ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works for me the way I thought loving it

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's getting the work done... But I'm winging it. It came with no instructions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Likely returning
customer_reviews.text: I’m more than likely returning this... fine for smaller designs that can fit directly in middle, however, If the design extends outward towards the edges the plate doesn’t heat evenly through and the design will not heat enough to impress the design. So it’s a mas o menos purchase for me but since I need to run bigger designs I’ll need a heat press that heats evenly.
customer_reviews.author: BigLongman

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use once you figure out the settings
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars but it came with no instructions. Very easy to use once you figure out the settings. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy jones

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: The clamshell i bought arrived ina week and i put it on 360 F and it was smoking but today i put it on 375 F and it wasnt smoking also it clicks to let you know the temperature is ready i heated some transfers and it worked good. The sound is loud and annoying though so 4stars
customer_reviews.author: cccrispy3

customer_reviews.title: Faulty wiring
customer_reviews.text: This item sparked when I first plugged it in. Yes, I was using the appropriate voltage outlet. We tried again, multiple times, immediately trooping the circuit breaker. We did get it to work for about 15 minutes but it tripped the breaker again and we determined something must be faulty for this to happen continually. The item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend a power Press for my next purchase just for ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok heat Press, I'd recommend a power Press for my next purchase just for ease of operation with display.
customer_reviews.author: justashopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heat press
customer_reviews.text: Perfect heat press! We have no issues with the press! We press approx. 50 garners a day, and so far so good! Very little, not so easy to understand instructions, but most of it can be easily figured out through trial/error
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: right on time
customer_reviews.text: The machine was exactly what I expected. I received it in a timely manner. The only thing I had a problem with is that it did not come with a manual
customer_reviews.author: Pampering me Princess

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised.  Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this product. It is advertised to reach 399 degrees Fahrenheit, however my unit will not exceed 230 degrees. I have the machine set to its maximum (430) and it will not heat past 230 degrees according to my laser thermometer. This product does not come with any instructions and the adjusting the different settings is very confusing. I would not recommend this product to anyone, and will be returning this as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Makes a constant clicking noise but it doesn't seem to be doing anything to the machine. For the price it's a good deal.

customer_reviews.title: Had towatch a video for instructions
customer_reviews.text: Had to watch a video for instructions, doesn't come with any. Excellent product though.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy about

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of crap! Heated up once and then never worked again.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my heat press. I recently started a business and I have been using this press about a month. It does everything that I need to do. And a bonus is I don't have to use the iron anymore for my kids clothes lol.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I love it!! The shirts i have done so far have come out perfect!! And boy oh boy do i have plenty of ideas. I am just getting started!

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Wish it had included ANY sort of directions ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wish it had included ANY sort of directions or manual. I had to do my own research to find out how to get it set up and adjust my settings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product is great. My only issue is it came with no ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. My only issue is it came with no directions. I had to watch a video on to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great Heat Press !
customer_reviews.text: Instruction booklet came with the heat press. Easy to set up, warms up pretty quickly. So far, my only complaint is the rubber mat does stink but I'm sure you could replace it with something else or wrap it up in a pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need to know where I could go and watch a video on how to use this
customer_reviews.author: Zaethe1

customer_reviews.title: Love this heat press!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this heat press!! I will mention I read some reviews about not getting to temperature while using a heat gun.. But if you press a shirt and then shoot at the plate just after pressing, then temperature is correct. If you test the temperature by hitting the plates before pressing, it shows lower because the plate isn't fully pressed. But once pressed, full temperature reads. Sorry for being long winded and hope that makes sense!! Used this press for several months and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Caber

customer_reviews.title: No instructions came with it but it works great once I fixed a loose wire.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well but there is no manual or anything. You can email the company and they will send you the instructions. Mine arrived with a wire loose but once I took it apart and looked inside, I was able to easily fix it. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Junk!  Not the correct product!
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive an F2C press, I received a Zeny press. It also stopped heating correctly after a few months of owning it, then stopped turning on entirely a little over a year after purchase. Stay far away!
customer_reviews.author: BallHardU

customer_reviews.title: Amazing press but don't forget to use fabric or teflon as a buffer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great press. It works great and helps me make awesome shirts! I had to use a shirt to do sample tests of my different kinds/brands of vinyl. PLEASE REMEMBER TO USE TEFLON OR FABRIC BETWEEN TOP OF SHIRT AND PRESS! THE VINYL AND SHIRT WILL STICK TO IT. I was unaware of this when I started to use it and ruined my first shirt I made. The vinyl, the plastic liner that the vinyl comes on, and even the shirt all will still to the top of the press if you don't use teflon or fabric as a buffer.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Faulty arm!
customer_reviews.text: The arm gets stuck! It doesnt lift and you have to tug at it vigorously in order to get it to open so the clothes and vinyl dont get scorched!
customer_reviews.author: J & D C.

customer_reviews.title: keep looking
customer_reviews.text: issues after issue, wouldn't heat up all the way, it arrived beat to hell steer clear
customer_reviews.author: Texas556

customer_reviews.title: I love my heat press
customer_reviews.text: I love my heat press! I was hesitant to buy one because I wasn't sure if it was good quality and if it would work. I am glad I ordered this one. It was a good price and works well. I watched a video that a reviewer posted on how to set it and that helped better than the manual. I make sure I unplug it between uses. I use a piece of parchment paper between the shirts and the top when I press designs.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetiee1

customer_reviews.title: It works size wise. Takes 5-8 min to get ...
customer_reviews.text: It works size wise. Takes 5-8 min to get to temp. The plate shows a 25 degree diff from center to edges.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Alright for casual Usage
customer_reviews.text: Needs a instruction manual and one of the attachments came broke, but before I New it it was to late too return! So check attachments as soon as you buy it! Timer does not work that well now that I’ve used it a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Makes great shirts
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, easy to use. Anyone with half a brain can set the time and temp, if you can't you need to seek help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this press and heats up quickly. Great size for just about all my garments and bags that I usually press. It's very study and well made and such a great price compared to many other retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: It’s really easy to use and I haven’t had any issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the heat press for about a month and a half. It’s really easy to use and I haven’t had any issues with it. My heat press case with everything I need including instructions which are pretty easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: LO COST HEAT PRESS
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine for my needs. Sticking heat transfer vinyl to various materials and doing dye-sublimation prints on fabric or Corian plastic. Heats up quickly to about 400 deg F if needed. I set it at 320 deg for HTV prints. Simple timer/temp control. Only negative I have, is that the platen "shelf" does not allow for putting the side opposite the print side of a t-shirt underneath. Lack of swing away feature is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES NEWBERRY

customer_reviews.title: I've used a couple of times and the only thing ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used a couple of times and the only thing I have a problem with so far is the loud clicking sound.
customer_reviews.author: Allen T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! I have been doing test shirts to get used to the temperature and timing, but it works so great!
customer_reviews.author: Jesscia Cotton

product_meta.title: F2C 15" x 15" Black Heat Press Machine Digital Clamshell Transfer Sublimation Print Press Machine for T-Shirt 110V
feature_bullets: Professional Heat Transfer Machine-Voltage:110V Power:1200W, simple to use and no assembly needed, easier and practical than thes swing away ones, a great entry-level heat press for business or hobby purposes
Printing Area:15"x15"(38* 38cm), large and simple operation. Rigid steel frame industrial strength and durability allows for long-term use

Temperature Range:0-200C(0-400F);Time Range:0~ 9999 seconds. A successful print requires right time, temperature and pressure, the thickness of the fabric, even the type of printing paper, all will affect the performance of printing. Any kind of sublimation paper need be tested before mass production

The silicon pad can endure maximum 250 degrees Celsius without any distortion. If you feel the pressure is too much and it is hard to be pressed, or the pressure is not enough and it is too easy to be pressed, please adjust the pressure adjusting knob. The intensity of the machine will be injured if the pressure is too much

The heating plate with a full range of heating coils to allow for consistency throughout its surface, good in heat transfer printing on t-shirt, bags, puzzles, mouse pads etc, suitable for both home and commercial use. One-year warranty on machine and lifelong online technical support
